name: Command-line book tools
tagline: Some python code used on FBReader® book network
body:
Python library used on FBReader® book network (https://books.fbreader.org/) + some command line tools based on the library

Command line tools:
  ./create_opds.py:     OPDS catalog file creator (takes list of book links + some metainfo)
  ./encrypt.py:         Marlin ePub encryptor
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
